label: Dimmer
description: Allows for the control of the level of a device like a light or a dimmer switch.

level.label: Dimmer
level.description: A number that represents the current level, usually ``0-100`` in percent

setLevel.description: Set the level to the given value. If the device supports being turned on and off then it will be turned on if ``level`` is greater than 0 and turned off if ``level`` is equal to 0.

level.description: The level value, usually ``0-100`` in percent

rate.description: The rate at which to change the level
